parameter.title: Format of the generated DEM (roi_pac or gamma)
parameter.abstract: Format of the generated DEM, the value is roi_pac or gamma

workflow.title: SRTM Digital Elevation Model
workflow.abstract: This application generates the STRM DEM in ROI_PAC or GAMMA ready format

source.title: SAR product catalogue entry(ies) in RDF format
source.abstract: Define the list of one or more SAR products to generate a DEM for each input product. The products are passed by references to catalogue entries in RDF format
